resources.string: Create a simple website for a local company.

Project Kickoff!

* checked out a few hosting service providers
* client selected a yearly plan, helped with the basic setup
* discussion regarding site content
* created imprint, headers, footer\n* created main site\n* added swirling email gif to contact page
Implemented and tested site deployment/update chain

First meeting with customer:
* requirement sighting
* budget planning
* frameworks selected
First workshop and immediate story grooming with the team
First sprint planning:\n* commitment on stories 1, 2 and 4\n* still have to pick a dedicated UI/UX guy for our team
